product_HeadingName: Gigabyte B550 AORUS PRO AM4 ATX Motherboard
supported_cpu: AMD AM4 Socket for AMD Ryzen processors
BIOS: 256 Mb Flash ROM, UEFI AMI BIOS
form_factor: ATX Form Factor 12.0 inch x 9.6 inch ( 30.5 cm x 24.4 cm )
PCI: 1 x PCIe 4.0 x16, 1 x PCIe 3.0 x16 (x4 mode)
description: The Gigabyte B550 AORUS PRO is an ATX motherboard that supports AMD Ryzen processors. It features an AMD B550 chipset, PCIe 4.0 support, and robust AORUS components. With support for up to 128GB of DDR4 memory, it's perfect for gaming and content creation.

product_HeadingName: Gigabyte Z590 AORUS ELITE AC LGA1200 ATX Motherboard
supported_cpu: Intel LGA1200 10th and 11th Gen Core processors
BIOS: 256 Mb Flash ROM, UEFI AMI BIOS
form_factor: ATX Form Factor 12.0 inch x 9.6 inch ( 30.5 cm x 24.4 cm )
PCI: 1 x PCIe 4.0 x16, 1 x PCIe 3.0 x16 (x4 mode)
description: The Gigabyte Z590 AORUS ELITE AC is an ATX motherboard designed for Intel 10th and 11th Gen Core processors. It features an Intel Z590 chipset, PCIe 4.0 support, and onboard Wi-Fi. With support for up to 128GB of DDR4 memory, it's ideal for high-performance builds.

product_HeadingName: Gigabyte B450M DS3H Micro-ATX AM4 Motherboard
supported_cpu: AMD AM4 Socket for AMD Ryzen processors
BIOS: 128 Mb Flash ROM, UEFI AMI BIOS
form_factor: Micro-ATX Form Factor 9.6 inch x 8.0 inch ( 24.4 cm x 20.3 cm )
PCI: 1 x PCIe 3.0 x16, 1 x PCIe 2.0 x1
description: The Gigabyte B450M DS3H is a Micro-ATX motherboard designed for AMD Ryzen processors. It features an AMD B450 chipset and supports up to 64GB of DDR4 memory. With its compact form factor, it's suitable for smaller PC builds.
